Title: Russo-Ukrainian war, day 1052: US announced extensive Russian oil...

President Volodymyr Zelenskyy confirmed an upcoming visit by British Prime Minister Keir Starmer, which will focus on discussions about potentially sending British peacekeepers to Ukraine. President Zelenskyy also secured $2 billion in new military aid commitments during the latest Ramstein meeting, while Germany's Chancellor Scholz has blocked a new €3 billion aid package for Ukraine.
